column2: # make sure you have the data loaded and transformed as in Box 1
# include only complete cases for variables for which we take log
regoecd <- lm_robust(log(trade) ~ log(dist) + log(gdp_imp) + log(gdp_exp) + contig + comlang_off + colony + comcol + oecd, cluster = dist, data = OECDLR,

lm_robust(formula = log(trade) ~ log(dist) + log(gdp_imp) + log(gdp_exp) + 
    contig + comlang_off + colony + comcol + oecd, data = OECDLR, 
    clusters = dist, se_type = "stata")
